price: 201. Zij zullen er niet in geloven totdat zij de pijnlijke bestraffing zien.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
